website_summaries.verdict: One of Verizon and MetroPCS' least-expensive phones, the Samsung Galaxy Core Prime makes a decent entry-level choice, but it still isn't as good as the competition.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Core Prime has a small price tag, its 5-megapixel camera takes vibrant sunlit photos, and there's plenty of room for expandable storage
cons: Poor screen resolution dampens the Core Prime's appeal, and the front-facing camera captures pixelated selfies
Low-light photos appear blurry and dim

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The phone is unlocked and will eventually recognize the T-Mobile SIM card I have in it, but it takes awhile to recognize the card, as it wants to load MetroPCS initially. The screen is very sensitive, and I tend to exit out of applications on accident quite often. It's ok, good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Wernecke

customer_reviews.title: Defective and NOT UNLOCKED
customer_reviews.text: The phone was new and very fast, but it was defective because the Battery had problems and the screen flicked. And most importantly, IT WAS NOT UNLOCKED! It came locked to MetroPCS. Good thing that returned it and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: amna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought as a replacement of a Samsung Galaxy Core prime. Works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone happy
customer_reviews.text: We love our new phones. It is taking me a little longer to get used to it - I had an iphone before this. I am liking it and people can't believe what a great price we got them for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a Samsung 5 for the price I was mistaken , so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: toni bost

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this company!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a new phone. What we got was heavily used. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for a friend. However, when she got it, there was no phone. It had the battery and charger but no phone. I don't know what happen but she's pissed. However, it did arrive on time
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone is working great!! It arrived quickly, it was packaged well, had all the necessities. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Phone good. accessories rubish
customer_reviews.text: The phone in itself is good but the accessories are rubbish! the charger would get extremely hot while charging he phone and in turn the phone would get hot as well. I eventually used another charger for the same phone(core prime)and it charger without interuptions. However with my charger, after a few charge cycles it blew up and by reading the information on the charger it didn't indicate that it was a Samsung original charger.
customer_reviews.author: Leander

customer_reviews.title: Not an Unlocked phone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it was SUPPOSED to be an unlocked phone. when it arrived it was in a Cricket Wireless box and I couldn't use my T-Mobile SIM card I'm it because of that. Extremely disappointed. I sent it back and will be buying another elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Simmy

customer_reviews.title: i've enjoyed the product
customer_reviews.text: Yes, i've enjoyed the product.It is simply awesome. Good speed,nice cam clarity. Everything seems to be in place.
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: This phone was a cricket phone that only could be ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone was a cricket phone that only could be unlocked and used through cricket! the sim card did not work as well as the IMEI number and it came up it had not been purchased, cricket switched my IMEI and sim card out from another phone to even get it to work! Would have purchased through cricket because we could have got a free phone since we didn't have cricket service to begin with! RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Blanton

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone. It's a great basic Samsung phone
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: I have read some of the negative feed back I do not think they understood what they were getting . This is a Cricket phone yes it is but it will take AT&T & T Mobile Micro sim cards that is not a typo it will take two Micro sim cards and will work with Wal-Mart by T Mobile I have this phone sense Oct 2016 it works great . I would recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nuhn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone!
customer_reviews.text: It came a little later than I expected from Amazon.... But it came with a WIRED charging cable (not a usb) and it comes with a very old strange pair of Samsung earphones. Phone is working great with my AT&T service. It's pretty fast, I got my lollipop update almost immediately via OTA updates. Cameras are decent. And you only get 4 GB of space because the rest is for the OS. Great deal! Samsung for the win!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, Good price
customer_reviews.text: An excellent phone for a very low price. I am enjoying using it, and all of the smart-phone features.
customer_reviews.author: William A. St. John

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Needed to return this particular product because the battery would even drain when completely turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Michaelson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hold a charge long I think it needs a new battery
customer_reviews.author: Angela Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I really like this phone
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone. It features everything I need and I'm super happy with it. It's a good size, and easily fits in my pocket. Photo quality is so so, but is what I expected. It was exactly as advertised & arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy User

customer_reviews.title: BACK SPACE BUTTON DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: We're going to have to return this phone because the backspace button on the keyboard does not work, and when my daughter Google she saw that this seems to be a continual problem. Just wanted to let anyone out there know that upfront.
customer_reviews.author: Kari K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Not dual sim/duos as advertised!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially wanted a dual sim phone and was happy that this phone offered that feature. I made sure to specifically type in the phone name with the DUOS specification. Imagine my surprise when the product was delivered and was not the DUOS but the single sim version. I thought that it was my mistake but I'm still getting this phone when I type in a search. I'm very upset and unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nelle J

customer_reviews.title: this is by far the worst phone i have ever had
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the worst phone i have ever had, and i was tricked into thinking it was a single sim
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Targ Manure
customer_reviews.text: To say you get what you pay for is an understatement. This phone worked fine at first but like everyone else that wrote a review, after about 3 months it started freezing up. Now it won't even let me answer phone calls. As soon as I swipe to answer it hangs up on whomever is calling. If I was in an emergency situation this phone would be completely useless as it takes me about 10 minutes to get to where I can make a call. If you need a phone for about 3 months then this one would be fine but otherwise don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: which most people would think isn't really that bad. Until you're in a hurry to do something ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about 8 months. Then it got slow. Really slow. Now a year or so later, it crashes daily. For no particular reason. Freezes up for 30 seconds at a time, which most people would think isn't really that bad. Until you're in a hurry to do something and you can't because it's frozen on the lock screen.
customer_reviews.author: iamzizzy

customer_reviews.title: Idk if its me amd just have crappy luck with anything electronics or its straight talk itself
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this phone bc i wanted to switch to straight talk from verizon prepaid. Well i am very unhappy w this phone. after i activated it the text messing app didnt wrk properly then i had forgotten to refill my phone so when i did refill it the internet didnt work at all even after i called straight talk to have them fix it. Nope still no internet even after three months. Idk if its me amd just have crappy luck with anything electronics or its straight talk itself. Every phone ive had with staright talk never worked properly
customer_reviews.author: gina yvonne livermore

customer_reviews.title: good for 6 month only
customer_reviews.text: i got this phone from t mobile store .good for 6 month only . now it have problem connecting to pc . all of my pc won't recognize this device any more . i can't download all picture to my pc .. do not buy it .. at your own risk ...
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Worst handheld device ever.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is honestly the WORST device I have ever used. EVER. Period. I mean, a gameboy crashes less. I bought the thing new from Walmart, and i installed Skype, Facebook, Facebook Messenger, Snapchat and XMP For android. Those were the only apps I installed. This phone does not open snapchat anymore, because it crashes instantly. The keyboard constantly 'restarts' and keys never even work. It takes about ~30 seconds to wake it up from sleep, and entering your password is NOT an option, as the keyboard hardly ever comes up. Also, its screen resolution is so low it looks like a CRT monitor from 1990.
customer_reviews.author: Basilio

customer_reviews.title: cant use any storage
customer_reviews.text: with all of the pre-downloads and crap that they put on the phone, you can't use any of the storage, and can't move there things to an ad card.
customer_reviews.author: kayden butterworth

customer_reviews.title: com/downloads Hands on Video costumer review decent battery life operates fast easy to use screen is hard to see in direct ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands on Video costumer review decent battery life operates fast easy to use screen is hard to see in direct sunlight and no gorilla glass . Pretty much the hybrid version of galaxy s4 and s5 but the mini version with low end camera but very similar performance and identical built
customer_reviews.author: brsrafal

customer_reviews.title: this phone not worth buying keeps shutting down
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this phone last night plug the head phone in. just shut off restart it lost all my contacts piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Chevy Boiiii

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend you all keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Using this phone in genuinely infuriating. It is extremely slow, and your ever single action has this obnoxious delay/lag to it. You press a button, then wait a second or 2 for just about everything you do. It gets old really fast, I highly recommend you all keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Bought one two weeks ago from T-Mobile, fell off ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one two weeks ago from T-Mobile, fell off the bed on the rug and shattered the screen. The case came in the mail a day later, it cost too much to fix. That if you find someone to fix it. Get the case first. It works though.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Rogo

customer_reviews.title: Makes me miss my Windows phone.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who writes a positive review for this phone is a shill and a liar. There is very little, correction, absolutely nothing redeeming about this phone. Whether it's the slow speed, complete lack of storage space, or insanely slow processor, you will find that spending a single dime on this phone will leave you feeling disappointed, and looking for the nearest hammer to smash it. If you run into one in the wild, do Humanity a favor and destroy it with prejudice. This is by far the worst phone I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: great and cheap
customer_reviews.text: The screen, despite being WVGA (480p), is fairly sharp. The (removable) 2000 mAh battery provides enough juice for about 4 hours of screen on time, which is considered above-average. The Core Prime has a simple design and is well built. The camera is suprisingly good, considering that the phone was only 50 bucks at MetroPCS. In all, you could get a much better phone from China at a similar price (Doogee X5 is 80 bucks and has much higher specs), but I guarantee you that no obscure Chinese OEM (Elephone, Doogee, Umi... the list goes on) has the reliability and build quality that comes with a Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: I have this phone (through T-Mobile) and have had it for going on 2 years. It works great. Battery life seems to be lagging a bit but I suppose after time, that happens. I bought it because of its nice smaller size. HATE those huge i-phone things and will never ever buy one! Sound clarity is good, screen resolution is fine (I am not a game player nor a video watcher on my phone). Does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: MoChroi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible piece of crap!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, hands down, the WORST phone you could ever imagine!!! Bought it trying to save money and I truly regret it! Every single day, multiple times a day, this phone locks up to the point I have to take the battery out. It lags all day, very, very slow. Terrible graphics, camera really fuzzy. Not much storage at all. I could go on and on. It sometimes takes me up to 20 minutes to send one message through Facebook on messenger due to slowness and locking up. DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE!!! You will regret it!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone worked well for a little while, but it is having a hard time running 2 apps at the same time anymore... I cant listen to music while browsing Facebook, the music app crashes. Also, when I plug my phone into a charger sometimes it just shuts down by itself. I don't recommend this phone, just go with a Galaxy Grand Prime, it's well worth the money and I had no problems with it when I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Jezebel81

customer_reviews.title: alright
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ph after my Samsung light got wet. It was a downgrade. However it's good if u just need a pH to get by.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my first smart phone ever two months ago. I gave it two months to make sure I learned how to use it before bashing it. I constantly have to turn my phone off to get my 4g connection and it freezes a lot. I try to make a call and freezes. Not a bad beginner phone but the price is a little much for not working correctly. Not Horrible but if you frustrate easily I would find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Camera
customer_reviews.text: I tried this phone out when on sale at Tmobile. I'm so glad I tested the camera! It takes very DULL pictures, so if you use your phone a lot for pictures this phone is a bad choice! The Kyocera Hydro Wave phone took very bright clear photos- I don't know much about all the features of this phone- I liked the keyboard at least, and internet access was quick. It seems that if there's a great sale price, they probably want to clear their inventory~
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Paper weight
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone I have ever owned. The internal antenna is very small, if you live in a rural area this phone will NOT work for you. I have a LG which works great. Will be returning this phone ASAP. Garbage very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad mic
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but mic is terrible i plan on getting a ear piece so i can hear the person and they can hear me
customer_reviews.author: a heimisher

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for 3 months and can't say enough about it. Wanted a galaxy but the s6 & s7 was out of price range, but when I saw this phone I was thrilled it's a great phone that's well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: ladiesman21795

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot cheaper then amazon it's one of the best phones I ever had I like it more then ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this exact same phone from T-Mobile a lot a lot cheaper then amazon it's one of the best phones I ever had I like it more then the not-3
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone I have ever owned, looking back now I can't fathom why I ever complained about my galaxy Avent, in hindsight it was a great phone, I wish I didn't accidentally drop it in the toilet. This phone however, the toilet is too good for it
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lauer

customer_reviews.title: m sure their are better phones out there but I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: this is my first smartphone. I,m sure their are better phones out there but I love this phone. I have learned to do so much with it and learning everyday......love it
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Newton

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY from this phone.
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT purchase this phone even if you get it for free!!! And there are many who would want to give it away for free. It is not even made in China---it is still a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Khurana

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Core Prime G360M/DS - Unlocked (White)
product_meta.description: The GALAXY Core Prime features a simple and elegant design built with a durable frame that feels like anodized metal, and just 3.5 inches thin!
